name: Luke Sidewalker
description: In a city that never sleeps, one man has a lot of places to be. Meet Luke, a perfectly average and mild mannered man living in New York City. Help him hurry his way down the sidewalks of New York City, through 7 neighborhoods including Time Square, LES, and Central Park.
minimum_requirements: OS: 7, 8 Processor: 2GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 512 MB Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: 7, 8 Processor: 2GHz Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 512 MB Storage: 500 MB available space
